# ComparableImpl.OperatorGreaterThanOrEqual&lt;T&gt; method

Standard implementation of the greater than or equal to operator.

```csharp
public static bool OperatorGreaterThanOrEqual<T>(T left, T right)
    where T : class, IComparable<T>
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| left | The left item. |
| right | The right item. |

## Return Value

True if the left is greater than or equal to the right.
